definition: to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: The negative tendencies that accompany any creative project are strong.
sentences.chinese: 伴随任何创造性项目的负面趋势都是强烈的。

sentences.english: The damaging effects of alcohol on testosterone are made even worse when you exercise before drinking.
sentences.chinese: 若您运动后饮酒，酒精对睾丸酮的负面影响更加严重。

sentences.english: Write down these negative put-down thoughts and challenge them with reality.
sentences.chinese: 写下来那些负面的想法，然后用现实去挑战这些想法。

sentences.english: The Boxer Band tunes in to historyThe Boxers’ negative image in the West is of little concern.
sentences.chinese: 当地毫不在意义和团在西方人眼中的负面形象。

sentences.english: Negative feelings and moods are contagious as well.
sentences.chinese: 负面情绪和心情也是有感染力的。

sentences.english: The government has countered such negative reports with positive propaganda.
sentences.chinese: 政府则用正面宣传来反驳这样的负面报道。

sentences.english: So you are as though attracting facts that further deepen your negative beliefs.
sentences.chinese: 所以你好像在一直吸引坏的事情来加深你的负面信念。

sentences.english: Of course, not everyone is negative.
sentences.chinese: 当然，并非人人都持负面看法。

sentences.english: Was there any negative feedback on your sex scenes or for playing a lesbian?
sentences.chinese: 演拉拉或拍床戏，有没有得过任何负面的回响？

sentences.english: Early September data suggests a similar negative trend.
sentences.chinese: 九月初数据也显示了同样的负面趋势。

sentences.english: Sophistry is a kind of special negative thought.
sentences.chinese: 诡辩是一种特殊的负面思维形式。

sentences.english: Your negative emotions aren’t there to annoy you or distract you.
sentences.chinese: 你的负面情绪不会惹恼你，或困扰你。

sentences.english: Pectinase treatment improved the CPAM drainage ability significantly without negative effect on the strength properties.
sentences.chinese: 酶处理对成纸的白度与强度性能没有负面影响。

sentences.english: Think twice even when there is only one negative reference.
sentences.chinese: 即便只有一个负面的意见，你也要三思而后行。

sentences.english: That drag has been more or less fully offset by the boost from net trade.
sentences.chinese: 净贸易的增加或多或少弥补了这一负面影响。

sentences.english: Implementing the logic in the client application has a negative impact on performance.
sentences.chinese: 在客户端应用中实现这一逻辑将对性能造成负面影响。

definition: to reject/to exclude/to eliminate/to remove/to repel
